mapper.select: select a.*, (select stat_name from status b where b.stat_no=a.edu_status and b.stat_col='EDU_STATUS') as "STR_STATUS" from education a where ind_id=#{id} order by a.edu_sdate
select a.*, (select stat_name from status b where b.stat_no=a.edu_status and b.stat_col='EDU_STATUS') as "STR_STATUS" from education a where edu_no=#{eduNo}
mapper.update: insert into education (EDU_NO, IND_ID, EDU_NAME, EDU_DEP, EDU_MAJOR, EDU_SDATE, EDU_EDATE, EDU_STATUS, EDU_SCORE) values (EDUCATION_SEQ.nextval, #{indId}, #{eduName}, #{eduDep}, #{eduMajor}, #{eduSdate}, #{eduEdate}, #{eduStatus}, #{eduScore})
update education set edu_name=#{eduName}, edu_dep=#{eduDep}, edu_major=#{eduMajor}, edu_sdate=#{eduSdate}, edu_edate=#{eduEdate}, edu_status=#{eduStatus}, edu_score=#{eduScore} where edu_no=#{eduNo}
